Package com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist

Interface Summary
IAssistAttrValueContributor Clients implement this interface if they wish to provide tag attribute value insight.
IAssistContributor All clients that wish to provide assist for documents should implement this interface.
IAssistState AssistInfo is filled by the CFE-core.
IAssistTagAttributeState This represents the state of a tag attribute assist request.
IAssistTagContributor The interface for a tag assist contributor.
IAssistTagState This interface is used when there is information about a tag available.
 

Class Summary
AssistUtils This class provides a few helper utilities for the content assist code.
CFContentAssist This is the root tag-based content assist for CFEclipse.
CFEContentAssist  
CFEContentAssistManager CFE has it's own method for content assist to allow a easier method of contributing information to the user.
CFEPrimaryAssist  
CFIncludeTemplateAssist This class provides attr/val content assist for cfinclude's template attribute.
CFMLFunctionAssist Provides CFML Function parameter assist.
CFMLScopeAssist Provides CFML Scope Assist at the tag-insight level.
CFMLTagAssist The CFML tag assistor.
DefaultAssistAttributeState  
DefaultAssistState This is the default implementation of the assist state information.
DefaultAssistTagState Default implementation of the content assist tag state.
DefaultTagAssistContributor The default tag assstor The tag Assistor can be used to provide generic tag-based assist.
HTMLTagAssistContributor TODO Provide class description
